content: Makes the 6db lowpass filter for `Class.AudioFilter` 25% faster.

Adds a second argument to the `Class.Players.PlayerRemoving` signal to specify the exit reason for the removing player. For now, the specifications are coarse (`Enum.PlayerExitReason|CreatorKick`, `Enum.PlayerExitReason|PlatformKick`, `Enum.PlayerExitReason|Unknown`) and may be expanded in the future.
Deprecates support for OpenGL ES 2.0 (legacy mobile graphics API).

Adds the property `Class.Stats.MemoryTrackingEnabled`. This property checks the validity of the `Class.Stats:GetMemoryUsageMbForTag()` and `Class.Stats:GetMemoryUsageMbAllCategories()` methods, and the validity of the memory information in the **Memory** tab of the MicroProfiler and the Developer Console.
Changes behavior of the sun to slowly fade in/out during sunrise/sunset.
Fixes drag in on-screen MicroProfiler when using touch input.
Fixes the `MaxVisibleGraphemes` property for `Class.TextLabel`, `Class.TextButton`, and `Class.TextBox` used with text containing right-to-left characters.
Fixes collision detection issues with `Class.PhysicsService:CollisionGroupSetCollidable()` for nearby objects.
On Windows, Studio no longer generates sporadic `Enum.UserInputState.Begin` events for a key when releasing <kbd>Shift</kbd>/<kbd>Ctrl</kbd>/<kbd>Alt</kbd> modifiers.
Fixes `Class.BasePart.CanCollide` changes not being respected when a part is inside another's bounding box.

`Class.UISizeConstraint` no longer blocks setting `Class.UISizeConstraint.MinSize|MinSize` larger than `Class.UISizeConstraint.MaxSize|MaxSize`, and no longer outputs a warning. If in an invalid state, then the constraint will be ignored.
Fixes false culling for skinned meshes in some scenarios.
Bounding boxes for cylinders and spheres will once again render the logical extent of the part rather than the physical size for better editing mechanics.
Fixes an issue where sounds can be audibly played after closing an experience.
Fixes `Class.AudioEmitter` spatial offset bug for systems with high default channel count.
Fixes incorrect `vector.lerp()` behavior for some inputs in Luau Native Code Generation.
